item.title: Flyclient Super Light Clients For Cryptocurrencies
item.description: Flyclient Super light client for cryptocurrencies Benedikt Buenz, Mahdi Zamani buenz@cs.stanford.edu Thank you. As you know, the blockchain is a chain because each block connects to the previous block through these hashes. In the header of each block is a commitment to all the transactions. It’s using this merkle hash tree where at each level the parent node hashes to the children and this gives you some nice properties which I will talk about later.
